attributes.action: Stop the support of Tony Blair for president of Europe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This man is considered by myself and many of disgruntled ex-Labour voters (particularly the tens of thousands who attended the 'Stop the War demonsrations in London) to be guilty of genocide, should he really be being considered for this much-publicised role, when there is a current investigation into the Iraq war in progress ? I think not

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
